titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that aviators who meet the qualification standards of the Air Forces Escape and Evasion Society should be granted recognition for meritorious service by the Department of Defense.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on National Security.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary: 2/11/1997--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that aviators who meet the qualification standards of the Air Forces Escape and Evasion Society should be granted recognition for meritorious service by the Department of Defense.
